titleStmt.title: The true trauaile of all faithfull Christians, hovve to escape the daungers of the vvicked vvorld VVhereunto is added a christian exercise for priuate housholders.
titleStmt.author: Chub, William.

notesStmt.note: "A christian exercise for priuate housholders" has caption title and separate register.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
